name: Urban Warriors
description:
A frantic 4 player arena fighting game featuring both versus & beat 'em up co-op adventure modes!

Join the Urban Warriors and brawl against various street gangs, bank robbers, cyberpunks, rogue ninjas, & other foes.

Gameplay inspired by Fighting Force, Power Stone 2, Dynamite Cop, & Marvel Nemesis

Pick up & Play Arcade Style Gameplay!

Features

  • 4 Player Local Multiplayer
  • Beat ‘em up Coop Adventure Mode
  • Versus Mode
  • 3D Arena Fighter
  • Melee Combos with Launchers, Air Juggles
  • Chargeable Attacks
  • Weapons/Items
  • Throwing & Catching Props
  • Guard Breaks
  • Parry
  • Costumes
  • Grab & Throw Opponents
  • Destructible Props
